channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish everywhere, 9th December
item.description:
Lots of rubbish everywhere. Needs to be cleared.

item.title: Dog mess on pavement, 9th December
item.description:
Dog mess on Lancaster st /king James st !! It’s disgusting same suspects very large dog always off lead ! Needs cleaning asap,,, children using this route to primary school
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lancaster Street, Elephant and Castle, Greater London

item.title: No street lights outside Bermondsey Heights (Ilderton Road), 9th December
item.description:
The specific part of Ilderton Road outside Bermondsey Heights has zero street lights, it feels very unsafe to walk. The council does absolutely nothing for basic things like this, but we are left with high council tax bills.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 227-255, Ilderton Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned van vandalised, 9th December
item.description:
Same abandoned van taking space from the street which is already extremely busy and congested. The van is vandalised and tyres are flat. Will the council finally do their job and remove it from our area? We, the residents, will not tolerate this and continuent to fight against council's incompetence over such issues.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 227-255, Ilderton Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves, 9th December
item.description:
The road needs sweeping the leaves are out of control and due to a leak that is causing large water pool, people need to walk there it is very slippery and dangerous
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westcombe Hill, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road full of illegally parked lorry's, 9th December
item.description:
LA closed down complaints as no further action and unable to locate trailers No one could of attended Hailey road as full of un registered trailers and illegally parked lorry's Will now start to report to police and explain Bexley is not interested
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hailey Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London

item.title: Motorbike parked on the curb, 9th December
item.description:
This motorbike has been parked on the curb for many weeks. He has an illegal numberplate which folds back and should not be parked on the curb in the first place. Please arrange for this vehicle to be removed as it is restricting access.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rushmore Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 9th December
item.description:
Flytipping Reported via mobile in the Flytipping - White Goods category anonymously at 09:49, Monday Sent to Southwark Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 8515492 I received an email saying is been fix, the job hasn't been fix yet.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Grange Yard, Old Kent Road, Greater London
